```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

#MVP
##Question 1.
```{r}
backpack_data <- backpack

glimpse(backpack_data)
```

##Question 2.

```{r}
ggplot(backpack_data) +
  aes(x = backpack_weight) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 20, col = "white") 
```

##Question 3.
```{r}
ggplot(backpack_data ,aes(x = backpack_weight, fill = sex)) +
  geom_bar() +
  facet_wrap(~ sex)
```


##Question 4.
```{r}
ggplot(backpack_data) +
  aes(
    x = body_weight,
    y = backpack_weight
  ) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE) +
  labs(x = "body weight", y = "backpack weight")
```


## Question 5.
```{r}
  ggplot(backpack_data) +
  aes(x = body_weight, y = backpack_weight, colour = sex) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "body weight", y = "backpack weight")
```


## Question 6.
```{r}
ggplot(backpack_data, aes(x = back_problems)) +
  geom_bar()
```


## Question 7.
```{r}
ggplot(backpack_data, aes(x= sex, fill = back_problems >= 1, group = back_problems) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge")
```


## Question 8.
```{r}
ggplot(backpack_data, aes(x = body_weight, y = backpack_weight))+
  geom_point()+
  facet_grid(back_problems ~ sex)
```


Try both backpack_weight and body_weight as well as the ratio.
